titleStmt.title: The petition of the Lords Spiritual and Temporal for the calling of a free Parliament: together, with his Majesty's gracious answer to their Lordships.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Pyke in Pall-Mall,

notesStmt.note: The only way to prevent war is to call a free Parliament speedily.--Steele.
"The Lords Petition, with the Kings Answer, may be Printed, Novemb. 20th. 1688."
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
